mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sys_app_user( username, password, salt, name, openid, unionid, status, store_id, date, province, city, district, phone, address, corp, person_id, login_date, `identity`, diedstatus ) VALUE ( #{username}, #{password}, #{salt}, #{name}, #{openid}, #{unionid}, #{status}, #{store_id}, #{date}, #{province}, #{city}, #{district}, #{phone}, #{address}, #{corp}, #{person_id}, #{login_date}, #{identity}, #{diedstatus} )
mapper.select: SELECT uid, username, password, salt, name, openid, unionid, status, store_id, province, city, district, phone, address, corp, identity FROM sys_app_user where uid=#{uid}

SELECT s.uid, s.username, s.password, s.salt, s.name, s.openid, s.unionid, s.status, s.store_id, s.province, s.city, s.district, s.phone, s.identity, s.diedstatus, s.address, s.corp, st.name sname, st.address as saddress, st.number, st.phone FROM sys_app_user s LEFT JOIN store st on st.store_id=s.store_id where username=#{username} and password=#{password} AND diedstatus = 0 and is_delete =0

SELECT uid, username, password, salt, name, openid, unionid, status, store_id, province, city, district, phone, address, corp, identity, diedstatus FROM sys_app_user where username=#{username} and is_delete =0

SELECT uid, username, password, salt, name, openid, unionid, status, store_id, province, city, district, phone, address, corp, identity, diedstatus FROM sys_app_user where store_id=#{store_id} AND identity = 3 and is_delete =0
and uid = #{uid}

and ss.store_id = #{store_id}
